app_name: Groups Control Groups Voice Recording and Karaoke Apps Microphone Voice Recorder Pro
app_description: Mobile recording studio in your hands. Use your device as real microphone to record and edit any sound you want. THIS SOUND STUDIO INCLUDES: Various microphones with original sound and specifications Up to 10 tracks recording: each sound its own place Notes for lyrics with auto scroll Pop Filter for removing unwanted overtones Audio signal s visualization: too loud red alert Volume mixer Simple audio editor: fast editing without any other apps Real time pitch changer 2x volume booster amplifier FEATURES WHICH MAKE THIS APP THE ONE YOU NEED Duplication in headphones: you can clearly hear what you re recording Active noise cancellation during recording Built in mic s record choice: bottom front or rear 3D effect: surround sound thing Demo tracks: try all features Unlimited audio recording: only HQ iTunes Files uploads: add any sound from your library Saving projects: Coming back to recording anytime Informative knowledge base for exploring the various functions of the app UNDOUBTEDLY COOL AUDIO EFFECTS 12 bands equalizer with presets Reverb a bunch of spaces presets Delay Compressor Destroyer Pitch Speed Choir effect Stereo Expander Audiobus support: Now you can stream live audio directly to other Audiobus compatible apps! Fast and easy way to record edit and boost audio. Subscription Microphone Recorder : Get access to all functions of the application.
